data.title: Funckenhausen La Espera Chardonnay
data.meta_description: Funckenhausen La Espera Carpe Diem Reserva Chardonnay | 100% unoaked Chardonnay | Shared with you in Switzerland by Cepandes
data.text:
Limited, small and discontinuous lots that embody the value of time in a product as special as this fresh chardonnay from southern Mendoza.

—

750 ml bottle. 100% Chardonnay from vineyard at San Rafael, Mendoza, Argentina, at 850 meters above sea level. pH 3.70. Acidity 5.90 g/l. Residual sugar 1.80 g/l. Alcohol 13.80 % vol. (75 cl Fr. 22.00, 1 L Fr. 29.33)

—

Harvest 2019: 92 points (Descorchados), 90 points (Tim Atkin). Ideal growing conditions in Mendoza, where Chardonnay benefited from excellent conditions. The freshness of this chardonnay with its slightly citrus aroma with herbal touches, increases on the palate as the acidity is the protagonist. A white wine both edgy and dense, with a soft fruity sweetness at the end.

—
